resources.string: WIP overrides are not yet supported in this version.

resources.string: Can\'t load data. Check your connection.
You need an internet connection to complete the action.
You must have a board selected to complete that action.
Can\'t create card. Try again later.
An error occurred. Try again later.
Can\'t load comments. Check your connection.
Can\'t create comment. Try again later.
Can\'t move card. Try again later.
Can\'t delete card. Try again later.
Can\'t load archive. Try again later.
Can\'t load data. Check your connection.
The card will not be recoverable.
Can\'t update card. Try again later.
Format from web app kept as inline html tags
Don\'t have an account yet? Visit LeanKit.com from a desktop or laptop and create your board today.
LeanPocket \u2014 Your kanban board, in your pocket.
Collaborate with your friends and teammates with card comments by purchasing the premium upgrade.
An error occurred while trying to display a lane. Send error details to the developer to help get it fixed?
Delete the below contents if you do not wish for the developer to see the contents of your board lanes.\n\n

An unexpected error occurred. 

Please help us fix it by sending us the error data, including details about your board structure. 

Click OK to send.
